long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless LinkedIn Close Integration – Now with AI Insights!

Streamline your LinkedIn sourcing and Close CRM workflow with LinkMatch. Save time and focus on building relationships that drive results.

Key Features:
- Automatic Recognition: Instantly see which LinkedIn profiles (people and companies) are already in your Close database.
- Save Time, Work Smarter: Skip the manual checking – connect with new leads and prospects right away.
- Edit Directly in LinkedIn: View, save, and update profile details from Close without leaving LinkedIn.
- NEW – AI Insights: Leverage AI-powered recommendations to prioritize leads, enhance follow-ups, and close deals faster.

LinkMatch is the ultimate LinkedIn Close integration tool, designed to make your workflow seamless and efficient, whether you're managing sales or building connections.


------
Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- tabs: for finding a tabs which has LinkedIn launched to show notification if needed

- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.close.com/* - to be able to make requests to Close API
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
